alert.note: Alert for Adair; Macon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 10:13AM CDT until June 29 at 10:45AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Adair County in northeastern Missouri... Macon County in north central Missouri... * Until 1045 AM CDT. * At 1013 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles west of La Plata to 6 miles west of Atlanta to 6 miles southwest of Callao, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Macon, La Plata, Bevier, Atlanta, Callao, Brashear, New Cambria, Gibbs, Millard, Elmer, Ethel, South Gifford, Kirksville Regional and Excello. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
